text: Futhi ngokunjalo sinenze naba yisizwe esiphakathi nendawo ukuze nibe ngofakazi kubantu nokuthi isithunywa sibe ngufakazi kunina. Futhi Asiyimisanga leyo Qibla ebikade nijwayele ukuyisebenzisa ngaphandle kokuba sazi lowo olandela isithunywa kulowo ophendule izithende zakhe zabheka emuva. Futhi ngempela kunzima ngaphandle kwalabo abaholwe nguMvelinqangi. Futhi akusiyena uMvelinqangi onenze nalahla ukholo lwenu, ngempela uMvelinqangi kubantu unozwelo unesihawu
